name: Legacy of Ozem
text: Your purity is so great that the blades and bows of long-forgotten heroes sing to you as if they had been made for your righteous hands.
benefit: When using good-aligned weapons, including those under the effects of a bless weapon spell, you gain a +1 sacred bonus on damage rolls.
text_zh: 你是如此的纯洁，那些久被遗忘英雄的长弓剑刃对你吟唱，如同他们就是为你的正义之手而生。
benefit_zh: 当使用善良阵营的武器时（包括被祝福武器术（bless weapon）影响的武器）你的伤害获得+1神圣加值。
